text: Basically I would love to see graphs like in this paper: <https://upc.lbl.gov/publications/husbands-lu-sc07.pdf> Figures 4 and 5. I imagine if one instrumented the MPI, added the timers, and then logged it out - one could produce these things nicely. I think Dagger.jl has some of this tooling now. <@U6A0PD8CR>?

elements.text: Basically I would love to see graphs like in this paper:
Figures 4 and 5. I imagine if one instrumented the MPI, added the timers, and then logged it out - one could produce these things nicely. I think Dagger.jl has some of this tooling now.

text: Yeah we have a realtime Gantt chart and (sort-of working) Profiler, but it all needs significant improvements.
